sentences.en: As the application of the transgenic technology , oil content of rapeseed is increasing more and inure.
sentences.cn: 不利的储藏条件常导致油脂的酸值和过氧化值升高, 油色变暗.

sentences.en: One cannot inure oneself altogether to such malicious criticism.
sentences.cn: 谁也不能总是忍受这种恶意批评.

sentences.en: The cease - fire agreement inure from next Monday.
sentences.cn: 停火 协定从下星期一开始生效.

sentences.en: The inure information reveled, the less profit they can make.
sentences.cn: 信息披露越充分, 潜在投资者的利润越少.

sentences.en: The one - way ticket between London and Dover will inure from next week.
sentences.cn: 伦敦与多佛间的 单程票 从下周起有效.

sentences.en: This Insurance shall not inure to the benefit of the carrier or other bailee.
sentences.cn: 承运人或其他保管人不得主张本保险的利益.

sentences.en: We should inure ourselves to hard life.
sentences.cn: 我们应该使自己习惯艰苦生活。

sentences.en: Your unemployment insurance will inure from the third week of your being out of work.
sentences.cn: 从你失业的第三周起,你的失业保险就开始生效.

words.tran_cn: 使习惯；有助于；生效（inure的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to cause to accept or become hardened to; habituate
